mission.name: Task Rank: Member
mission.description: You are member of the Task Society hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Task Society points.

mission.name: Task Rank: Ranger
mission.description: You are Ranger of the Task Society hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Task Society points.

mission.name: Task Rank: Big Game Hunter
mission.description: You are Big Game Hunter in the Task Society hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Task Society points.

mission.name: Task Rank: Trophy Hunter
mission.description: You are Trophy Hunter in the Task Society hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Task Society points. Ask Taina for {special task} she might have something for you.

mission.name: Task Rank: Elite Hunter
mission.description: You have obtained the highest possible rank in the Task Society hunting elite, you are Elite Hunter. You currently have |STATE| Task Society points. Ask Taina for {special task} she might have something for you.
